revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #31 Kiwan |image = [[File:Spelon.png]] |caption = Cette Baie est si épicée qu'une bouchée suffit à faire cracher du feu à un Pokémon, qu'il soit de type Feu ou non. |growtime = 4h 18m 0s |harvest = 30 baies |replant = 10% |mutation = 0,02% |points = 900 |flavor =
*30 épicée *10 sèche *0 sucrée *0 amère *0 acide }} '''Kiwan''' est un type de [[Berries/fr|Baie]] qui peut être plantée dans la [[Farm/fr|Ferme]]. Elle s'obtient en entourant 1 [[Tamato/fr|Tamato]] avec au moins 130, mais pas plus de 160 points de saveur épicée, ainsi que pas plus de 80 points de toute autre saveur. La [[Tamato/fr|Tamato]] aura alors des chances de muter en Kiwan. == Tables de croissance == === Stades de croissance === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Pousse !! Arbuste !! Fleuri !! Mûr |- ! Temps écoulé depuis plantation | 33 mins 20 secs || 1 heure 56 mins 40 secs || 3 heures 20 mins || 4 heures 18 mins - 8 heures 36 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:SpelonTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:SpelonTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:SpelonTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Temps de croissance avec modificateurs === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modificateur !! Temps maturité-flétrissement !! Nombre de Fertipousse requis |- ! Aucun | 4 heures 18 mins -
8 heures 36 mins || --- |- ! Engrais ou Kwakarroisoir | 2 heures 52 mins -
5 heures 44 mins || 35 engrais |- ! Engrais et Kwakarroisoir | 1 heures 54 mins 40 secs -
2 heures 49 mins 20 secs || 23 engrais |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Spelon_Flow_Chart2.png|500px]]
== Stratégie de mutation == === Formations possibles ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Spelon berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Tamato.png|30px]]
[[Tamato]] || style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Tamato.png|30px]]

'''[[Tamato]]''' || [[File:Tamato.png|30px]]
[[Tamato]] |- style="height: 26px;" | [[File:Tamato.png|30px]]

Spelon berries can be used to mutate the following berries.

revision.comment: Created page with "'''Kiwan''' est un type de [[Berries/fr|Baie]] qui peut être plantée dans la [[Farm/fr|Ferme]]. Elle s'obtient en entourant 1 [[Tamato/fr|Tamato]] avec au moins 130, mais pas plus de 160 points de saveur épicée, ainsi que pas plus de 80 points de toute autre saveur. revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #31 Kiwan |image = [[File:Spelon.png]] |caption = Cette Baie est si épicée qu'une bouchée suffit à faire cracher du feu à un Pokémon, qu'il soit de type Feu ou non. |growtime = 4h 18m 0s |harvest = 30 baies |replant = 10% |mutation = 0,02% |points = 900 |flavor =
*30 épicée *10 sèche *0 sucrée *0 amère *0 acide }}
'''Spelon''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Tamato]] with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of spicy and no more than 80 points of all other flavours. The [[Tamato]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry.
== Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 33 mins 20 secs || 1 hour 56 mins 40 secs || 3 hours 20 mins || 4 hours 18 mins - 8 hours 36 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:SpelonTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:SpelonTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:SpelonTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}
=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 4 hours 18 mins -
8 hours 36 mins || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 2 hours 52 mins -
5 hours 44 mins || 35 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 1 hour 54 mins 40 secs -
2 hours 49 mins 20 secs || 23 mulch |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Spelon_Flow_Chart2.png|500px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Spelon berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Tamato.png|30px]]
[[Tamato]] || style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Tamato.png|30px]]
[[Tamato]] || style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Tamato.png|30px]]

revision.comment:
Created page with "{{Infobox Berry |name = #31 Kiwan |image = [[File:Spelon.png]] |caption = Cette Baie est si épicée qu'une bouchée suffit à faire cracher du feu à un Pokémon, qu'il soit de type Feu ou non. |growtime = 4h 18m 0s |harvest = 30 baies |replant = 10% |mutation = 0,02% |points = 900 |flavor =
*30 épicée *10 sèche *0 sucrée *0 amère *0 acide }}"

revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #31 Spelon |image = [[File:Spelon.png]] |caption = So spicy is the Spelon Berry that, Fire type or not, Pokémon will try to breathe fire after eating a single one. |growtime = 4h 18m 0s |harvest = 30 berries |replant = 10% |mutation = 0.02% |points = 900 |flavor =
*30 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }}
'''Spelon''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Tamato]] with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of spicy and no more than 80 points of all other flavours. The [[Tamato]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry.
== Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 33 mins 20 secs || 1 hour 56 mins 40 secs || 3 hours 20 mins || 4 hours 18 mins - 8 hours 36 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:SpelonTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:SpelonTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:SpelonTreeBerry.png|50px]] |}
=== Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 4 hours 18 mins -
8 hours 36 mins || --- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 2 hours 52 mins -
5 hours 44 mins || 35 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 1 hour 54 mins 40 secs -
2 hours 49 mins 20 secs || 23 mulch |}
== Flow Chart == [[File:Spelon_Flow_Chart2.png|500px]]
